<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sides </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Object Detection </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Count how many units in the given array belong to given side. If the object in passed array is a [[Group]], the leader of the group will be counted. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> side '''countSide''' arrayName</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> side: [[Side]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> arrayName: [[Array]] of [[Object]]s and/or [[Group]]s </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_num = [[west]] [[countSide]] [[list]] _triggerOne;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_numCivPlayable = [[civilian]] [[countSide]] [[playableUnits]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[countFriendly]], [[countEnemy]], [[countUnknown]], [[count]], [[countType]], [[playersNumber]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
